navigation.loginRequired: Please log in to create a market

home.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to view markets

history.title: Tip History
history.subtitle: Track your sent and received tips
history.loginRequired: Log in to view your tip history

twish.subtitle: Manage your embedded {{token}} balance and transfers.
twish.loginRequired: Please log in to your wallet
twish.loginTitle: Log in to your embedded wallet
twish.loginSubtitle: Use social login or connect an external wallet to continue.
twish.receiveDescription: Send {{token}} to your embedded wallet address to top up.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your account information and preferences
profile.loginRequired: Please log in to view settings
profile.avatarNote: Your avatar is from your social login account
profile.emailNote: Used for important notifications and account updates
profile.usernameLocked: Your username is locked. Click "Change" to edit it.
profile.saveError: Failed to save, please try again
profile.displayNameNote: Your display name is automatically generated from your login method
profile.walletNote: This is your Solana wallet address
profile.walletNote2: Your account is secured by your connected wallet. To manage your wallet, please use your wallet extension or app.

account.title: Account Management
account.description: Manage your wallet and account settings
account.exportNote: ⚠️ Keep your private key safe and never share it with anyone
account.noWallet: You haven't connected a Solana wallet yet
account.dangerZoneNote: These actions may have irreversible effects on your account
account.contactSupport: To delete your account or perform other sensitive operations, please contact support

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.comingSoonNote: Notification settings are currently under development

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Manage your privacy settings and data protection
privacy.dataProtectionNote: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your personal information and wallet data. Your private keys are securely managed by your wallet and we cannot access them.
privacy.yourRightsNote: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact our support team.

profile.notFoundDescription: Sorry, we couldn't find this user profile
profile.comingSoonDescription: User activity, positions, and trading history features are under development
profile.defaultBio: This user hasn't set up a bio yet

createUsername.title: Create Username
createUsername.description: Please set your unique username, this will be your identity on the platform
createUsername.requirements: 3-30 characters, letters, numbers and underscores only
createUsername.tooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
createUsername.invalidChars: Only letters, numbers and underscores allowed
createUsername.checkError: Failed to check username, please try again
createUsername.submitError: Failed to create, please try again

wish.createWishDescription: Create your own market and let others participate
wish.title: Title
wish.contentPlaceholder: Enter detailed description of your wish (optional)
wish.optionsHint: Tip: It's recommended to set contrasting options, such as 'gain good luck' and 'lose good luck'. When trading 'gain good luck', users can fill in the name/nickname/alias of the person receiving the blessing. When trading 'lose good luck', users can fill in the name/nickname/alias. You can also make an evil wish, but you need to set options for both negation and fulfillment.
wish.optionFieldsRequired: Option description and ticket are both required
wish.timeRangeError: End time must be after start time
wish.createError: Failed to create wish. Please try again.
wish.deployProxyWalletFirst: Please deploy your proxy wallet first

cash.title: Funding
cash.description: Manage your funds across chains and tokens
cash.signInDescription: Please sign in to access funding features
cash.depositDescription: Add funds to your account using credit/debit card
cash.bridgeDescription: Transfer tokens from other blockchains to Solana
cash.swapDescription: Convert your Solana tokens to USDC for trading
cash.depositInfo1: Supports credit/debit cards and bank transfers
cash.depositInfo2: Funds arrive as USDC on Solana
cash.phantomDescription: To add funds, please install Phantom and connect your wallet first.
cash.phantomStep1: Install the Phantom wallet extension or mobile app.
cash.phantomStep2: Create or import your wallet and back up the recovery phrase.
cash.phantomStep3: Return here and connect your wallet to continue.
cash.bridgeInfo1: Transfer time: 5-15 minutes depending on source chain
cash.bridgeInfo2: Small network fees apply for cross-chain transactions
cash.helpDescription: Check out our step-by-step guide on how to add funds to your account.

create.title: Create New Market
create.subtitle: Create a prediction market with multiple outcomes and Manifest order book
create.loginRequired: Please log in to create a market
create.titleDescription: A clear and concise title for your prediction market
create.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Will Bitcoin reach $100k by end of 2025?
create.descriptionDescription: Detailed information about the market, resolution criteria, and important dates
create.descriptionPlaceholder:
Provide details about:
- What exactly is being predicted
- How and when will this be resolved
- What sources will be used for verification
- Any important conditions or edge cases
create.categoryDescription: Select a category and resolution frequency for your market
create.outcomesDescription: Define the possible outcomes. Each outcome has a corresponding token that will be traded on Manifest order book.
create.outcomesRequired: All outcomes must have a name and token symbol
create.marketTypeDescription: Choose how many times this market can be settled
create.multipleSettlementDesc: Market can be settled a fixed number of times
create.invalidSettlements: Multiple settlement markets require at least 2 settlements
create.noteText: Market creation involves on-chain transactions. You will need to approve multiple transactions to:
create.step1: Create market account and pay rent

gasPayment.title: Gas Payment
gasPayment.solDescription: Transaction fees are paid with SOL.
gasPayment.needSol: You need SOL to pay for transaction fees. Please add SOL to your wallet.
